examples: jealousy was a component of his character
two constituents of a musical composition are melody and harmony
the grammatical elements of a sentence
a key factor in her success
humor: an effective ingredient of a speech

definitions.text: an artifact that is one of the individual parts of which a composite entity is made up; especially a part that can be separated from or attached to a system
examples: a component or constituent element of a system

definitions.text: any of the more than 100 known substances (of which 92 occur naturally) that cannot be separated into simpler substances and that singly or in combination constitute all matter
the most favorable environment for a plant or animal
examples: water is the element of fishes

definitions.text: one of four substances thought in ancient and medieval cosmology to constitute the physical universe
examples: the alchemists believed that there were four elements

definitions.text: the situation in which you are happiest and most effective
a straight line that generates a cylinder or cone
